sn8.1:1.2: ekam samayam ayasma vangiso alaviyam viharati aggalave cetiye ayasmata nigrodhakappena upajjhayena saddhim.
sn8.1:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma vangiso navako hoti acirapabbajito ohiyyako viharapalo.
sn8.1:1.4: Atha kho sambahula itthiyo samalankaritva yena aggalavako aramo tenupasankamimsu viharapekkhikayo.
sn8.1:1.5: Atha kho ayasmato vangisassa ta itthiyo disva anabhirati uppajjati, rago cittam anuddhamseti.
sn8.1:1.7: “alabha vata me, na vata me labha; dulladdham vata me, na vata me suladdham;
sn8.1:1.8: yassa me anabhirati uppanna, rago cittam anuddhamseti, tam kutettha labbha, yam me paro anabhiratim vinodetva abhiratim uppadeyya.
sn8.1:1.9: Yannunaham attanava attano anabhiratim vinodetva abhiratim uppadeyyan”ti.
sn8.1:1.10: Atha kho ayasma vangiso attanava attano anabhiratim vinodetva abhiratim uppadetva tayam velayam ima gathayo abhasi:
